SCTX:
Begin skaaldoorSound

short doOnce

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_SkaalAttack >= 25 )
	if ( doOnce == 1 )
		StopSound SkaalAttackNoise
		set doOnce to 2
	endif
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	if ( SkaalAttack == 1 )
		PlayLoopSound3D SkaalAttackNoise
		set doOnce to 1
	endif
endif







End skaaldoorSound
